summary: Tells the story of Maria, the devoted wife of a bank director. The couple has a cozy life. Their baby is cared for by the maid. On one of Maria's lazy afternoon she runs into an old friend ... See full summary »
cast: Arsenii Bibikov|V. Glinskaya|Ivan Gorskiy|Vera Kholodnaya|S. Rassatov|Andrey Sotnikov|Aleksandr Vyrubov
title: Deti veka
